youAreOfflineDescription: It seems you are offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.
guestLogoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
guestLogoutDescription: Since you're logged in as a guest, logging out will erase all your data, including your favorites and settings.
profile_bio: A brief bio or description goes here.
selected_language_text: The selected language will be applied throughout the application.
removeDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this item
InvalidResetLinkDescription: The password reset link you've used is no longer valid. Please request a new password reset link.
magical_stories_for_kids: Hikaya: Magical Stories for Young Minds!
hero_description: Embark on incredible adventures with interactive stories that spark imagination and foster a love for reading
interactive_stories_desc: Engaging tales that respond to your child's choices, making every reading session unique and personal
audio_narration_desc: Professional voice actors bring stories to life with captivating narration and sound effects
personalized_content_desc: Stories tailored to your child's age, interests, and reading level for optimal learning
visual_learning_desc: Beautiful animations and illustrations that help children visualize and better understand the stories
download_app_desc: Get started by downloading our app from your favorite app store
create_profile_desc: Set up your child's profile with age and interests
choose_stories_desc: Browse our collection of interactive stories
track_progress_desc: Monitor reading progress and unlock achievements
testimonial_1_quote: My kids absolutely love the interactive stories! They look forward to bedtime reading now more than ever.
testimonial_2_quote: The audio narration feature is fantastic. It helps my child follow along with the text while improving pronunciation.
testimonial_3_quote: As both a parent and teacher, I appreciate how the stories adapt to different reading levels. It's perfect for growing readers!
join_families: Be among the first families to experience magical bedtime stories
available_devices: Available on iOS and Android devices
footer_description: Inspiring young minds through interactive storytelling and magical adventures
hero_subtitle: Innovative apps and games that inspire, entertain, and transform experiences.
additional_platforms: Also available on Steam and other platforms
expert_development_desc: We create original and engaging games that captivate players worldwide.
cross_platform_desc: Enjoy our games seamlessly on mobile, PC, and console.
fast_delivery_desc: We ensure every game delivers a fun and flawless playing experience.
collaborative_team_desc: We listen to our community and involve them in improving and shaping our games.
hikaya_desc: Storytelling is a fun, engaging, and safe app designed to spark children's imagination through beautifully narrated and illustrated stories. With a simple and user-friendly interface, children can read, listen, and track their progress, while parents ensure a safe, ad-free experience.
Coup_board_game_desc: Step into a world of cunning and deception with Coup Online! Deploy your strategic skills as you navigate a landscape of perilous political intrigues. Play with friends or challenge players from around the world in this thrilling deduction game.
sketchIt_desc: Do you have the patience to draw but don’t know where to start? This is the place for you! This app works like tracing paper, helping you sketch everything easily and quickly. You can use it for educational purposes or just for fun.
our_mission_desc: We create innovative software solutions that deliver real value to our clients.
our_vision_desc: To be a leading software development studio known for quality, creativity, and excellence.
our_values_desc: Integrity, innovation, and collaboration drive everything we do.
our_team_desc: A talented and dedicated team committed to delivering outstanding results.
footerDesc: Crafting apps and games that inspire.
